amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to increase the Water and Related Resources Account by $1 million to be directed to the Colorado River Compliance Activities account, specifically for the Upper Colorado and San Juan River Endangered Fish Recovery programs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment redirects $1 million from the Energy Department Administration account to the Water and Related Resources account for the Upper Colorado and San Juan River Endangered Fish Recovery Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 142 (Roll no. 530).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 142 (Roll no. 530).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 142 (Roll no. 530).
